incident_updates.body: Start time : 27/02/2023 07:00 UTC End time : 03/03/2023 17:00 UTC Service impact : vSphere will be inaccessible for 1 hour during the maintenance. Hosts will be rebooted, but there is no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers without Zerto service.
